Text: BPA schedules using NAC transmission for Cc The shaped schedule of YS CNACBPATSYSSYS NFNACBPAEPMIPACWPACWTSYS F YS tag was reported to PRM scheduling coordinator for Northwest Aluminum Company aka NAC incorrectly by me Due to this lapse PRM will be calling in this schedule on real time tonight If there are any problems or questions please call my cell as I will not be at home for most of the evening This should be seamless for realtime unless BPA raises a stink The tag was made correctly and was implemented but the Excel spreadsheet I send to PRM had some bad information on it Sorry about that Donald Forwarded by Donald RobinsonPDXECT on PM Enron Capital Trade Resources Corp From Steve Jenkins PM To cc Subject RE CORRECTIONS I was able to call in the PGE line but not the PAC line They said it was after pm but it was by my clock We will call in the PAC line change in realtime tonight Steve Original Message From mailto Sent Friday February PM To Subject CORRECTIONS See attached file PRM PATHSFEBxls

Re BPA AND PGE SCHEDULE REINSTATEMENT Cc I spoke with the scheduler at PRM this morning He knows the schedule was called in incorrectly and assures me it has been fixed Please make sure anyway call BPA transmission business line Thanks Donald Lisa Gang PM To BILLWILLIAMS NRONCOM Stanley CT Jeremy CT Brian CT Geir CT Holden CT Jesse CT Michael M CT Lester CT cc Cara CT Donald CT Subject BPA AND PGE SCHEDULE REINSTATEMENT Please reinstate the following schedule on Real Time for mw for HE PRM forgot to call it into BPA Please remind PRM to call it into BPA Empower purchase BPA Empower sale to PGE Path ysNACBPAtsyssysNFNACBPAEPMI YS Thank You Lisa

Montana System schedule has been curtailed Cc OLSTRIP DAILYPGEEPMILOUISIANA PACIFIC MW FLAT LP deal at Montana System Louisiana Pacific was getting mw flat from our PGE Colstrip daily purchase As of HEpst on and through they need only mw an hour Unfortunately they called a little late for us to preschedule for so Real time will need to sell off mw an hour from HEpst on through HE on at Montana system The deal numbers for the PGE buy are as follows and and The Lotus notes data base has not been changed for but has been for will be taken care of on preschedule Thank you Donald

Vacation Time Cc I will be on vacation for the week of December I will be returning to work on Cara and Mike Purcell will be handling MID C scheduling Thanks and Happy Holidays Donald

MIDC path going realtimePST Due to problems with a Mirant downstream I had to change a couple of paths late Monday The new and improved paths are LADWPCISOTLDWPSYL GFLDWPTSYLMALIN LDWPFLATSYLMALIN LDWPCALADWPMORGANBPATMALINJD FBPATJDPGE NFMORGANAEPEPMICAESPGE Deal numbers and IPCOIPCOTIPCOLGBP FIPCOEPMIMIRANTSNOHBPATLGBPJD NFSNOHMIRANTBPATJDMALIN FCISOTMALINNPMIRANT Deal numbers and Both for mw on Lightload for I have made a tag for the LA to PGE path It was made as a preschedule tag but due to the lateness of it BPA may deny it just because they can If that happens EPMI realtime will have to make a realtime tag You can use my tag as a template Late breaking news my tag went undelivered due to communication failure at PGE so I faxed the tag to all the counterparties Mirant has made tag for the IPCO to NP path All counterparties have been called as of and are aware that these schedules are going realtime that is their real time groups will call the schedules in to BPA EPMI realtime will have to make sure this gets done with a reminder phone call to our counterparties I have spoken with PGEDonna AEPPeggy MirantEmily and IPCOPerry CAES Conagra had already gone home for the day and has no realtime Any questions Please call Thanks Donald Robinson
Out of the office for Thursday and Friday PST I will be returning Monday Cara will be doing COB and PGE system stuff in my absence Thank you for your support Donald

Preschedule path going RealTime for Friday Cc PST HLH MW BPA CEPMIMORGANPINWCPSPPLMSNOHTBPAPHTSP NFPPLM PPLM failed to buy the transmission for Friday This path will go realtime Our realtime just needs to monitor and make sure PPLM gets the tranny purchased and calls it in to BPA in a timely manner The Saturday path is fine Thanks Donald

Preschedule paths going realtime for Sunday and Monday and PST Preschedule had a heckuva day on Friday Due to many problems some of our tags were not completed until after the pm preschedule deadline Apparently some of our counterparties automatically deny late tags though they may be corrections of tags made prior to the deadline In any case we have a list of tags that have been submitted as realtime tags and the schedules should be treated such The tags and paths are as follows DELAYED TAG NEEDS SUBMITTED NO LATER THAN AN HOUR BEFORE SCHEDULE FLOWS MW HE ON PSCOGWSYSPSCOTWSYSCRAIGGFDESERRETTCRAIGBONANZAmnfDESERRETTBONANZAMONAmnfPACTMONAREDBUTTEfNEVPTREDBUTTEMEADmnfPSCOEPMIAPSTMEADPVEMPIAPSTMEADWWPV FEPMIPACECISOTPVMALINPACETMALPACE SYSPACE DELAYED TAG NEEDS SUBMITTED NO LATER THAN AN HOUR BEFORE SCHEDULE FLOWS MW HE IN PSCOGWSYSPSCOTWSYSCRAIGGFDESERETTCRAIGBONANZAmnfDESERETTBONANZAMONAmnfPACTMONAREDBUTTEfNEVPTREDBUTTEMEADmnfPSCOEPMIAPSTMEADWWPV FEPMISRPSRPTPVKYRENEGFSRP DELAYED TAG NEEDS SUBMITTED NO LATER THAN AN HOUR BEFORE SCHEDULE FLOWS MW HE IN PSCOGWSYSPSCOTWSYSCRAIGGFDESERETTCRAIGBONANZAmnfDESERETTBONANZAMONAmnfPACTMONAREDBUTTEfNEVPTREDBUTTEMEADmnfPSCOEPMIAPSTMEADWWPV FEPMIPNMEPETPVWWSRPTWWMEADNEVPMEAD MW HE ON DGTMONAAEPPSCOEPMIPACTMONAREDBUTTENEVPTREDBUTTEMEADNEVP MW HE ON DGTMONAAEPPSCOEPMIPACTMONAREDBUTTENEVPTREDBUTTEMEADCRCMEAD MW HE ON DGTMONAAEPPSCOEPMIPACTMONAREDBUTTENEVPTREDBUTTEMEADCRCMEAD DELAYED TAG NEEDS SUBMITTED NO LATER THAN AN HOUR BEFORE SCHEDULE FLOWS MW HE ON PSCOGWSYSPSCOTWSYSCRAIGGFDESERRETTCRAIGBONANZAmnfDESERRETTBONANZAMONAmnfPACTMONAREDBUTTEfNEVPTREDBUTTEMEADmnfPSCOEPMIAPSTMEADPVEMPIAPSTMEADWWPV FEPMIPACECISOTPVMALINPACETMALPACE SYSPACE Thanks Donald PS Lisa will be adding to this list with a following note
Out of the officePST I will be out of the office from through Cara will be scheduling Mid Columbia in my absence Thanks Donald

Regarding previous notePST It seems I failed to mention in the previous note that the MPCDETMEPMIAVISTAGCPD path is a Mid Columbia Light load path The deal number for the Duke purchase is The deal number for the Avista sale is Thanks Donald

LLH Schedule going realtime for Cc PST MPCDETMEPMIAVISTAGCPD Duke was unable to purchase transmission for this path on preschedule Duke has notified everyone in the path that they will be purchasing the transmission in real time EPMI real time group needs to monitor this and make sure they get the upstream from Duke and pass it on the Avista Avista will make tags According to DrewDuke Montana will generate at Colstrip and the transmission should go from Colstrip to Garrison then another leg of transmission from Garrison to GCPD system If you have any questions let me know Thanks Donald Robinson

Regarding Grant PUD cut from previous notePST As stated in the previous note the detmepmigcpd schedule was cut to zero for HEpdt on Monday Duke will resupply in realtime EPMI real time will need to make sure you get an upstream from Duke then tag the schedule for these two hours I have already cancelled the first tag and made a new tag for HEpdt Let me know if you have any questions Thanks Donald
